alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:32PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hendry, northern Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 132 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, or 11 miles west of Sunrise, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Weston, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Loxahatchee NWR and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
